cz.kinst.jakub.androidette

Class HTTPSmartClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.kinst.jakub.androidette.HTTPSmartClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class HTTPSmartClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is responsible for posting HTTP requests with supplied arguments (POST and/or GET) to a given server and retrieving provided data. Client is also responsible for cookie managing. It stores cookies recieved from server and uses them in following requests. This is essential for logging purposes.
    Author:
    Jakub Kinst
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
